item.description:
This is an easy walk at Hale Reservation located on Carby Street in Westwood. There are several hiking trails available here, but we will remain on the paved road, making it suitable for beginners.

Please wear appropriate shoes, bring water, bug spray & sunscreen. (Most of the walk is shady.)

Please park just inside the gates or along Carby Street near the Dept Public Works.  We'll meet at the trail map across from the office.  From the Office at the entrance of the Reservation to Powissett Lodge will take us about 30 mins with additional time if participants want to stop at Noanet Pond. At Powissett Lodge will head back on the same road, ending at the Reservation Office.

Our Route:

http://www.mapmyfitness.com/routes/view/137159007

Full Hale Reservation map:

http://halereservation.org/Forms/Visting_Forms/2007HaleMapFront.pdf
item.name: Easy Hale Reservation (Carby Street, Westwood, MA) Walk - 1 hour
